hero.title: Improve your CV and get the job you want
hero.subtitle: Analyze your CV, discover your missing skills and aim for your dream job.
hero.searchTraining: Search for training for a position

createCV.title: Create My CV
createCV.description: Create a professional CV in minutes with modern templates.

searchTraining.title: Training Search
searchTraining.description: Analyze your CV against a job offer and discover missing skills.

searchJob.title: Search for a job
searchJob.description: Find relevant offers and start the analysis with one click.

recruiter.title: Find the perfect talents for your company
recruiter.description: Access parsed and standardized candidate profiles with fast filters and shortlist tools to help recruiters quickly identify qualified candidates.

feature1.title: Talent search by skills
feature1.description: Quickly identify candidates with the specific skills you need.

feature2.title: Parsed & standardized profiles
feature2.description: Automatically extract and normalize candidate data for easy comparison.

feature3.title: Fast filtering & shortlists
feature3.description: Use filters, tags and quick previews to build a shortlist efficiently.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.step1: Import or create your CV in minutes.
howItWorks.step2: Enter the position you're targeting or paste
howItWorks.step3: Receive a complete analysis and recommendations.

why.title: Why improve your CV?
why.description: 90% of candidates don't get interviews simply because their CV doesn't clearly show the skills sought. With Mitady Asa, identify your weaknesses and increase your chances of getting your dream job.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of recruiters who trust Orienta

candidates.title: Candidate List
candidates.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, title or skills...

analysis.title: Search for training for a position
analysis.jobDescriptionHelp: The more detailed the job description, the more accurate the analysis.
analysis.fillJobDescription: Please fill in the job title and description
analysis.aiHelper: Analyze your CV with our AI to get personalized recommendations.
analysis.methodMixedDesc: Type title, description, responsibilities and skills manually
analysis.clickToChoose: Click to choose or drag & drop your CV
analysis.fileFormats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, JPG, PNG • Max 10 MB
analysis.boostDesc: Discover recommended trainings to acquire the missing skills and increase your chances for this position.
analysis.fileTypeNotAccepted: File type not accepted. Accepted formats: {formats}
analysis.noPreview: Preview not available for this file type
analysis.fileWillBeProcessed: The file will be processed during analysis

jobResearch.title: Job Search
jobResearch.howItWorksDesc: We analyze your CV to extract skills and experience, then build targeted job queries and filters to surface relevant job postings for you to review and shortlist.
jobResearch.querySuggestion: If the listings below aren't helpful, try the 'Search on Google' button to broaden results.
jobResearch.noJobsFiltered: No job matches the selected filters.

formations.title: Training for this position
formations.saveBoxDesc: Save this position to find it later among your important positions with its associated trainings.

savedPosts.title: Important Positions
savedPosts.noSaved: No saved positions yet. Go to "Training" and click "Save position".
